body.name: OVENTE Electric Countertop Double Burner, 1700W Cooktop with 6" and 5.75" Stainless Steel Coil Hot Plates, 5 Level Temperature Control, Indicator Lights and Easy to Clean Cooking Stove, Black BGC102B

features: STRESS-FREE COOKING – Equipped with a 6-inch and 5.75-inch hot plate and a durable stainless steel heating tube. This burner heats up quickly and cooks food evenly. You can use it for frying, keeping food warm, boiling hot water or soup.
EFFICIENT POWER – Powered with 1700 watts that provides fast, consistent and even heating. Its metal housing is resistant to high temperatures and won’t easily warp or bend even after years of use.

MAINTAINS DESIRED TEMPERATURE – Simply turn the adjustable control knob to the appropriate temperature setting for your food. The indicator light will illuminate red to indicate the cooktop is warming or heating and will go off once the highest temperature has been reached.

COMPACT AND LIGHTWEIGHT – Add extra space to your kitchen counter for holiday or parties. Perfect for wherever an extra cooking is needed, at home, apartment, school, office and RVs. You can even bring it along on vacation and camping trips.

EASY TO CLEAN – The premium stainless steel base allows you to clean food drippings and splatters easily with a non-abrasive sponge or soft damp cloth. Also the non-slip rubber feet ensure the product remains stable and prevents from sliding.

US-BASED CUSTOMER SERVICE LETS YOU BUY WITH CONFIDENCE – OVENTE warranties that the product shall be free from defects in material and workmanship under normal use and conditions, for 1 year from the original purchase date.
body.description: Discover how quick and hassle-free it is to cook meals with the OVENTE Electric Double Coil Burner. This hotplate has a 6-inch and 5.75-inch durable stainless-steel heating tube and a fire-resistant metal housing that can last for years. Features a 1700 wattage (120 volt) that heats up quickly with low, medium, and high temperature settings for your everyday needs, which is ideal for efficiently cooking all kinds of dishes. From small family gatherings to large holiday events, fiesta or simply entertaining friends either its breakfast, lunch or dinner this double coil burner will surely come handy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice hot plate
reviews.reviewText: This hot plate works well, heats up and boils things quickly. Easy to wipe off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So lightweight it feels cheap but it worked PERFECT at Thanksgiving & Christmas when I needed the extra burners! I highly recommend it because I've had no problems at all with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Convenient, portable, Good quality for the price
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. A well-loved product that's been very good and reliable for a few months now.It keeps us at a quick pace and not a good temperature too. Never burned myself on the metal it's actually made out of.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works great!
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this for my main cook top, and overall I'm really happy with it! I'd say the only thing that's less than ideal is that it takes a long time for water to boil for things like rice or pasta, but it will get the water to boil if you give it time. I love it for the rest of my cooking!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Like it. Save on energy works just like a top stove w/o cost. Heat up nicely. Bought mines from warehouse just like new.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great with pans small than 9 inches
reviews.reviewText: Works good use it almost daily

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Poor design for heat transfer
reviews.reviewText: I bought both products below:1. The Proctor Silex Electric Single Burner Cooktop, Compact and Portable, Adjustable Temperature Hot Plate, 1200 Watts, White & Stainless (34106). ASIN #: B086BYH8LJ2. The Ovente 1700W Double Hot Plate Electric Countertop Coil Stove 5.7 & 6 Inch with Dual 5 Level Temperature Control & Stainless Steel Base, Easy Clean Portable Cooktop Burner for Cooking, Black BGC102B. ASIN #: B07HJQCSXHThe Proctor Silex pros:-Heats significantly faster, and water is actually boiling-Easy to clean (you can lift up the coil)-The coils have more surface area (i.e. more coiled metal) so it heats faster-The coils have a flat top, so pots/pans stay on it much betterCons:-The power cord is very short. I had to get an extension cable (as you can't use a regular extension cable or you can start a file) with enough electrical capacity to carry the juice, such as this item: 12 Ft Appliance Extension Cord Heavy Duty, Gray - 14 Gauge 3 Prong SPT-3 Cable for Air Conditioner or Refrigerator (ASIN #: B07ZS2X5VB)-The power LED comes on the moment you plug it. But to be fair, this is working as designed because it's a "power" LED that shows when it has power and NOT an LED that comes on when you actually have the knob turned to on. It's a poor design, but it is working as designed.The Ovente pros:-It has two burnersCons:-Cooking things on top of it, sometimes the pots and pans move so you have to use one hand to hold the pot/pan, such as when cooking eggs. This is because the top of the coils are not flat, and some parts stick slightly up higher.-Water did eventually boil after a significant amount of time longer than the Proctor Silex, but the water appears to "simmer" more than boil. I believe this is due to the fact the coil has less surface area to make contact.-Power cord also very short, but slightly longer than the Proctor Silex. Still, it's too short and I needed a powerful 14 gauge power extension to use it under the vent.-The unit itself got much hotter than the Proctor Silex, so you can easily burn yourself if you're not careful.I would purchase the Proctor Silex again. I wouldn't purchase the Ovente again. In fact, since it's dangerous as things can fall off the coils AND it doesn't seem to heat as well and takes a long time before water actually boils, I'll be returning it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
